node.description: The target gains an extraordinary ability to heal their wounds. Examples of this include the supernatural regeneration of a troll, a super soldier's adrenal biomod, or the ability to channel energy that results in continous healing. Regardless of the source, wounds close before the very eyes of an onlooker.
node.effect:
While the regeneration boon is sustained, the target heals hit points at the beginning of each of the boon invoker's turns. The amount of healing is determined by the power level of the boon.
  • Power Level 1 - 1d4
  • Power Level 3 - 1d6
  • Power Level 5 - 1d8
  • Power Level 7 - 1d10
  • Power Level 9 - 2d6
node.name: Regeneration
node.special: This boon does not heal lethal damage.
